title: States told to meet green energy purchase obligation
description: The power ministry has urged states to adhere to their renewable purchase obligations, highlighting the necessity to meet renewable energy consumption targets. Non-compliance with these targets has been noted in states like Andhra Pradesh and Gujarat, urging stricter enforcement to achieve anticipated RPO targets by FY25 and FY30.
